## Vegetation units

For the description of the ecological charachteristics, the ecosystem types have been grouped into five broader "ecosystem groups". Descriptions for each ecosystem type are available at [the National Vegetation Map project wesbite](https://bgis.sanbi.org/Projects/Detail/101) and thus not duplicated here.
